item.title: Learn Golang from base
item.description: Learn Golang, the language developed by Google This post is based on the following video on my channel. This video is in Spanish, but if you know Spanish, you can see it here: But dont worry if you dont know Spanish, I’ll let all explained here. The things you will need to follow this tutorial are the following: An editor (VSCode): https://code.visualstudio.com/ The Go compiler: https://go.dev/dl/ “Hello world” in Go The first program that all programmers write is always the well-known “Hello world”.
